Nightlight::

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Ok no more brooding about the wars and what could 
be. We have each other and thats enough for now.
> 
> Rodimus really enjoyed Nightlight. She wasn't like some of the 
other femmes he had been involved with. He always seemed to choose 
the ones that he knew had no chance. Something bad would always 
happan to them. He had only really loved two. Arcee chose Springer 
over him and the came back into his life only to die. Now there was 
Nightlight. This one was going to have a happy ending.
